opc:EnumeratedType.Name: IdType
opc:EnumeratedType.opc:Documentation: The type of identifier used in a node id.

opc:Value.Name: Numeric
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The identifier is a numeric value. 0 is a null value.

opc:Value.Name: String
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The identifier is a string value. An empty string is a null value.

opc:Value.Name: Guid
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The identifier is a 16 byte structure. 16 zero bytes is a null value.

opc:Value.Name: Opaque
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The identifier is an array of bytes. A zero length array is a null value.

opc:EnumeratedType.Name: NodeClass
opc:EnumeratedType.opc:Documentation: A mask specifying the class of the node.

opc:Value.Name: Unspecified
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: No classes are selected.

opc:Value.Name: Object
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node is an object.

opc:Value.Name: Variable
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node is a variable.

opc:Value.Name: Method
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node is a method.

opc:Value.Name: ObjectType
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node is an object type.

opc:Value.Name: VariableType
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node is an variable type.

opc:Value.Name: ReferenceType
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node is a reference type.

opc:Value.Name: DataType
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node is a data type.

opc:Value.Name: View
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node is a view.

opc:ComplexType.Name: Node
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: Specifies the attributes which belong to all nodes.

opc:Field.Name: NodeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A unique identifier for the node.

opc:Field.Name: NodeClass
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The class of the node.

opc:Field.Name: BrowseName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The browse name of the node.

opc:Field.Name: DisplayName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The display name of the node.

opc:Field.Name: Description
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The description of the node.

opc:Field.Name: WriteMask
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask indicating which attributes are writeable.

opc:Field.Name: UserWriteMask
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask indicating which attributes are writeable by the current user.

opc:Field.Name: References
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The references that belong to the node.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ObjectNode
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: Specifies the attributes which belong to object nodes.

opc:Field.Name: EventNotifier
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask indicating whether events are produced by the object.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ObjectTypeNode
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: Specifies the attributes which belong to object type nodes.

opc:Field.Name: IsAbstract
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the type is abstract and only subtypes of it appear in the address space.

opc:ComplexType.Name: VariableNode
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: Specifies the attributes which belong to variable nodes.

opc:Field.Name: Value
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The current value.

opc:Field.Name: DataType
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The data type of the value.

opc:Field.Name: ValueRank
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Whether the value is an array type and the rank of the array if it is.

opc:Field.Name: ArrayDimensions
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The number of dimensions if the value is an array type and one or more dimensions have a fixed length.

opc:Field.Name: AccessLevel
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A bit mask specifying how the value may be accessed.

opc:Field.Name: UserAccessLevel
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A bit mask specifying how the value may be accessed by the current user.

opc:Field.Name: MinimumSamplingInterval
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The minimum possible sampling interval for the value.

opc:Field.Name: Historizing
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: TRUE if the server is current storing the history of the value.

opc:ComplexType.Name: VariableTypeNode
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: Specifies the attributes which belong to variable type nodes.

opc:Field.Name: Value
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The default value when creating new instances.

opc:Field.Name: DataType
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The data type of the value.

opc:Field.Name: ValueRank
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Whether the value is an array type and the rank of the array if it is.

opc:Field.Name: ArrayDimensions
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The number of dimensions if the value is an array type and one or more dimensions have a fixed length.

opc:Field.Name: IsAbstract
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the type is abstract and only subtypes of it appear in the address space.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ReferenceTypeNode
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: Specifies the attributes which belong to reference type nodes.

opc:Field.Name: IsAbstract
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the type is abstract and only subtypes of it appear in the address space.

opc:Field.Name: Symmetric
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the reference type has the same semantics in both directions.

opc:Field.Name: InverseName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The display name for the reference when following it from target to source.

opc:ComplexType.Name: MethodNode
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: Specifies the attributes which belong to method nodes.

opc:Field.Name: Executable
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the method can be called.

opc:Field.Name: UserExecutable
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the method can be called by the current user.

opc:Field.Name: ContainsNoLoops
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the view contains a tree of non-looping hierarchical references.

opc:Field.Name: EventNotifier
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask indicating whether events are produced by the view.

opc:Field.Name: IsAbstract
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the type is abstract and only subtypes of it appear in the address space.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ReferenceNode
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: Specifies a reference which belongs to a node.

opc:Field.Name: ReferenceTypeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The node id of the reference type for the reference.

opc:Field.Name: IsInverse
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The reference is an inverse reference.

opc:Field.Name: TargetId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The node id for the target of the reference.

opc:ComplexType.Name: Argument
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: An argument for a method.

opc:Field.Name: Name
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The name of the argument.

opc:Field.Name: DataType
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The data type of the argument.

opc:Field.Name: ValueRank
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Whether the argument is an array type and the rank of the array if it is.

opc:Field.Name: ArrayDimensions
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The number of dimensions if the argument is an array type and one or more dimensions have a fixed length.

opc:Field.Name: Description
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The description for the argument.

opc:ComplexType.Name: EnumValueType
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A mapping between a value of an enumerated type and a name and description.

opc:Field.Name: Value
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The value of the enumeration.

opc:Field.Name: DisplayName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Human readable name for the value.

opc:Field.Name: Description
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A description of the value.

opc:TypeDeclaration.Name: Duration
opc:TypeDeclaration.opc:Documentation: A period of time measured in seconds.

opc:TypeDeclaration.Name: UtcTime
opc:TypeDeclaration.opc:Documentation: A date/time value specified in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

opc:TypeDeclaration.Name: LocaleId
opc:TypeDeclaration.opc:Documentation: An identifier for a user locale.

opc:TypeDeclaration.Name: IntegerId
opc:TypeDeclaration.opc:Documentation: A numeric identifier for an object.

opc:Value.Name: Server
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The application is a server.

opc:Value.Name: Client
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The application is a client.

opc:Value.Name: ClientAndServer
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The application is a client and a server.

opc:Value.Name: DiscoveryServer
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The application is a discovery server.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ApplicationDescription
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: Describes an application and how to find it.

opc:Field.Name: ApplicationUri
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The globally unique identifier for the application.

opc:Field.Name: ProductUri
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The globally unique identifier for the product.

opc:Field.Name: ApplicationName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The name of application.

opc:Field.Name: ApplicationType
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type of application.

opc:Field.Name: GatewayServerUri
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The globally unique identifier for the server that is acting as a gateway for the server.

opc:Field.Name: DiscoveryProfileUri
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The globally unique identifier for the discovery profile supported by the server.

opc:Field.Name: DiscoveryUrls
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The URLs for the server's discovery endpoints.

opc:ComplexType.Name: RequestHeader
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The header passed with every server request.

opc:Field.Name: AuthenticationToken
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The authentication token for the current session.

opc:Field.Name: Timestamp
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: When the request was sent by the client.

opc:Field.Name: RequestHandle
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A handle assigned by the client to the request. It is returned in the response.

opc:Field.Name: ReturnDiagnostics
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask indicating what diagnostic information should be returned in the response.

opc:Field.Name: AuditEntryId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Identifies an entry in the client audit log.

opc:Field.Name: TimeoutHint
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The timeout for the operation specified by the client.

opc:Field.Name: AdditionalHeader
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Allows vendor specific information to be included in the header.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The header passed with every server response.

opc:Field.Name: Timestamp
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: When the response was sent by the server.

opc:Field.Name: RequestHandle
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The handle passed by the client in the request.

opc:Field.Name: ServiceResult
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The result of the operation. If Bad there are no parameters returned.

opc:Field.Name: ServiceDiagnostics
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The diagnostics associated with the ServiceResult.

opc:Field.Name: StringTable
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A table of strings referenced by the diagnotics structures included in the request.

opc:Field.Name: AdditionalHeader
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Allows vendor specific information to be included in the header.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ServiceFault
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The response returned by all services when there is a service level error.

opc:Field.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:ServiceType.Name: FindServers
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Finds the servers known to the discovery server.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: EndpointUrl
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The URL used by the client to send the request.

opc:Parameter.Name: LocaleIds
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The locales to use when constructing a response.

opc:Parameter.Name: ServerUris
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The URIs of the servers to return (all servers returned if none specified).

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: Servers
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The servers that met the criteria specified in the request.

opc:TypeDeclaration.Name: ApplicationInstanceCertificate
opc:TypeDeclaration.opc:Documentation: A certificate for an instance of an application.

opc:EnumeratedType.Name: MessageSecurityMode
opc:EnumeratedType.opc:Documentation: The type of security to use on a message.

opc:Value.Name: Invalid
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: An invalid mode.

opc:Value.Name: None
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: No security is used.

opc:Value.Name: Sign
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The message is signed.

opc:Value.Name: SignAndEncrypt
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The message is signed and encrypted.

opc:Value.Name: Anonymous
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: An anonymous user.

opc:Value.Name: UserName
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: A user identified by a user name and password.

opc:Value.Name: Certificate
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: A user identified by an X509 certificate.

opc:Value.Name: IssuedToken
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: A user identified by WS-Security XML token.

opc:ComplexType.Name: UserTokenPolicy
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: Describes a user token that can be used with a server.

opc:Field.Name: PolicyId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A identifier for the policy assigned by the server.

opc:Field.Name: TokenType
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type of user token.

opc:Field.Name: IssuedTokenType
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type of issued token.

opc:Field.Name: IssuerEndpointUrl
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The endpoint or any other information need to contruct an issued token URL.

opc:Field.Name: SecurityPolicyUri
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The security policy to use when encrypting or signing the user token.

opc:ComplexType.Name: EndpointDescription
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The description of a endpoint that can be used to access a server.

opc:Field.Name: EndpointUrl
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The network endpoint to use when connecting to the server.

opc:Field.Name: Server
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The description of the server.

opc:Field.Name: ServerCertificate
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The server's application certificate.

opc:Field.Name: SecurityMode
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The security mode that must be used when connecting to the endpoint.

opc:Field.Name: SecurityPolicyUri
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The security policy to use when connecting to the endpoint.

opc:Field.Name: UserIdentityTokens
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The user identity tokens that can be used with this endpoint.

opc:Field.Name: TransportProfileUri
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The transport profile to use when connecting to the endpoint.

opc:Field.Name: SecurityLevel
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A server assigned value that indicates how secure the endpoint is relative to other server endpoints.

opc:ServiceType.Name: GetEndpoints
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Gets the endpoints used by the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: EndpointUrl
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The URL used by the client to send the request.

opc:Parameter.Name: LocaleIds
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The locales to use when constructing a response.

opc:Parameter.Name: ProfileUris
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The URIs of the transport profiles for the endpoints to return (all endpoints returned if none specified).

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: Endpoints
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The endpoints that met the criteria specified in the request.

opc:ComplexType.Name: RegisteredServer
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The information required to register a server with a discovery server.

opc:Field.Name: ServerUri
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The globally unique identifier for the server.

opc:Field.Name: ProductUri
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The globally unique identifier for the product.

opc:Field.Name: ServerNames
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The name of server in multiple lcoales.

opc:Field.Name: ServerType
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type of server.

opc:Field.Name: GatewayServerUri
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The globally unique identifier for the server that is acting as a gateway for the server.

opc:Field.Name: DiscoveryUrls
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The URLs for the server's discovery endpoints.

opc:Field.Name: SemaphoreFilePath
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A path to a file that is deleted when the server is no longer accepting connections.

opc:Field.Name: IsOnline
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If FALSE the server will save the registration information to a persistent datastore.

opc:ServiceType.Name: RegisterServer
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Registers a server with the discovery server.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: Server
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The server to register.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:EnumeratedType.Name: SecurityTokenRequestType
opc:EnumeratedType.opc:Documentation: Indicates whether a token if being created or renewed.

opc:Value.Name: Issue
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The channel is being created.

opc:Value.Name: Renew
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The channel is being renewed.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ChannelSecurityToken
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The token that identifies a set of keys for an active secure channel.

opc:Field.Name: ChannelId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A unique identifier for the channel.

opc:Field.Name: TokenId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A unique identifier for the current token.

opc:Field.Name: CreatedAt
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: When the channel was created.

opc:Field.Name: RevisedLifetime
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: When the channel will expiry.

opc:ServiceType.Name: OpenSecureChannel
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Creates a secure channel with a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ClientProtocolVersion
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The version of protocol used by the client.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestType
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: Whether the channel is being created or renewed.

opc:Parameter.Name: SecurityMode
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The security mode to use with the channel.

opc:Parameter.Name: ClientNonce
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A random number generated by the client.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestedLifetime
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The channel lifetime in milliseconds.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: ServerProtocolVersion
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The version of protocol used by the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: SecurityToken
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The token that identifies the new secure channel.

opc:Parameter.Name: ServerNonce
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A random number generated by the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:ComplexType.Name: SignedSoftwareCertificate
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A software certificate with a digital signature.

opc:Field.Name: CertificateData
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The data of the certificate.

opc:Field.Name: Signature
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The digital signature.

opc:TypeDeclaration.Name: SessionAuthenticationToken
opc:TypeDeclaration.opc:Documentation: A unique identifier for a session used to authenticate requests.

opc:ComplexType.Name: SignatureData
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A digital signature.

opc:Field.Name: Algorithm
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The cryptography algorithm used to create the signature.

opc:Field.Name: Signature
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The signature.

opc:ServiceType.Name: CreateSession
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Creates a new session with the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ClientDescription
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: Describes the client application.

opc:Parameter.Name: ServerUri
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The URI of the server that the client wants to create a session with.

opc:Parameter.Name: EndpointUrl
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The URL that the client used to connect to the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: SessionName
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A name for the session provided by the client.

opc:Parameter.Name: ClientNonce
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A random number generated by the client.

opc:Parameter.Name: ClientCertificate
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The application certificate for the client.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestedSessionTimeout
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The requested session timeout in milliseconds.

opc:Parameter.Name: MaxResponseMessageSize
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The maximum message size accepted by the client.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: SessionId
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A identifier which uniquely identifies the session.

opc:Parameter.Name: AuthenticationToken
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The token used to authenticate the client in subsequent requests.

opc:Parameter.Name: RevisedSessionTimeout
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The session timeout in milliseconds.

opc:Parameter.Name: ServerNonce
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A random number generated by the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ServerCertificate
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The application certificate for the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ServerEndpoints
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The endpoints provided by the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ServerSoftwareCertificates
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The software certificates owned by the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ServerSignature
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A signature created with the server certificate.

opc:Parameter.Name: MaxRequestMessageSize
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The maximum message size accepted by the server.

opc:ComplexType.Name: UserIdentityToken
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A base type for a user identity token.

opc:Field.Name: PolicyId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The policy id specified in a user token policy for the endpoint being used.

opc:ComplexType.Name: AnonymousIdentityToken
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A token representing an anonymous user.

opc:ComplexType.Name: UserNameIdentityToken
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A token representing a user identified by a user name and password.

opc:Field.Name: UserName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The user name.

opc:Field.Name: Password
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The password encrypted with the server certificate.

opc:Field.Name: EncryptionAlgorithm
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The algorithm used to encrypt the password.

opc:ComplexType.Name: X509IdentityToken
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A token representing a user identified by an X509 certificate.

opc:Field.Name: CertificateData
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The certificate.

opc:ComplexType.Name: IssuedIdentityToken
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A token representing a user identified by a WS-Security XML token.

opc:Field.Name: TokenData
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The XML token encrypted with the server certificate.

opc:Field.Name: EncryptionAlgorithm
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The algorithm used to encrypt the certificate.

opc:ServiceType.Name: ActivateSession
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Activates a session with the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ClientSignature
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A signature created with the client certificate from the last server nonce returned by the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ClientSoftwareCertificates
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The software certificates owned by the client.

opc:Parameter.Name: LocaleIds
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The locales to use with the session.

opc:Parameter.Name: UserIdentityToken
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The user identity to use with the session.

opc:Parameter.Name: UserTokenSignature
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A digital signature created with the user identity token.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: ServerNonce
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A random number generated by the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: Results
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: Any errors during validation of the software certificates.

opc:Parameter.Name: DiagnosticInfos
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The diagnostics associated with the software certificates results.

opc:ServiceType.Name: CloseSession
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Closes a session with the server.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: DeleteSubscriptions
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: If TRUE all subscriptions are deleted when the session is closed.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHandle
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The handle assigned by the client to the requests being cancelled.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: CancelCount
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The number of requests successfully cancelled.

opc:EnumeratedType.Name: NodeAttributesMask
opc:EnumeratedType.opc:Documentation: The bits used to specify default attributes for a new node.

opc:Value.Name: None
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: No attribuites provided.

opc:Value.Name: AccessLevel
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The access level attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: ArrayDimensions
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The array dimensions attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: BrowseName
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The browse name attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: ContainsNoLoops
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The contains no loops attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: DataType
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The data type attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: Description
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The description attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: DisplayName
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The display name attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: EventNotifier
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The event notifier attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: Executable
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The executable attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: Historizing
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The historizing attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: InverseName
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The inverse name attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: IsAbstract
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The is abstract attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: MinimumSamplingInterval
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The minimum sampling interval attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: NodeClass
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node class attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: NodeId
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node id attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: Symmetric
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The symmetric attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: UserAccessLevel
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The user access level attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: UserExecutable
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The user executable attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: UserWriteMask
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The user write mask attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: ValueRank
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The value rank attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: WriteMask
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The write mask attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: Value
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The value attribute is specified.

opc:Value.Name: All
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: All attributes are specified.

opc:Value.Name: BaseNode
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: All base attributes are specified.

opc:Value.Name: Object
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: All object attributes are specified.

opc:Value.Name: ObjectTypeOrDataType
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: All object type or data type attributes are specified.

opc:Value.Name: Variable
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: All variable attributes are specified.

opc:Value.Name: VariableType
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: All variable type attributes are specified.

opc:Value.Name: Method
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: All method attributes are specified.

opc:Value.Name: ReferenceType
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: All reference type attributes are specified.

opc:Value.Name: View
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: All view attributes are specified.

opc:ComplexType.Name: NodeAttributes
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The base attributes for all nodes.

opc:Field.Name: SpecifiedAttributes
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask indicating which attributes have been provided.

opc:Field.Name: DisplayName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A human readable name for the node.

opc:Field.Name: Description
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A description for the node.

opc:Field.Name: WriteMask
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask which specifies which attributes are writeable.

opc:Field.Name: UserWriteMask
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask which specifies which attributes are writeable by the current user.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ObjectAttributes
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The attributes for an object node.

opc:Field.Name: EventNotifier
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask indicating what events are produced by the object.

opc:ComplexType.Name: VariableAttributes
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The attributes for a variable node.

opc:Field.Name: Value
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The value of the variable.

opc:Field.Name: DataType
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The data type of the value.

opc:Field.Name: ValueRank
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Whether the value is an array type and the rank of the array if it is.

opc:Field.Name: ArrayDimensions
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The number of dimensions if the value is an array type and one or more dimensions have a fixed length.

opc:Field.Name: AccessLevel
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A bit mask specifying how the value may be accessed.

opc:Field.Name: UserAccessLevel
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A bit mask specifying how the value may be accessed by the current user.

opc:Field.Name: MinimumSamplingInterval
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The minimum possible sampling interval for the value.

opc:Field.Name: Historizing
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: TRUE if the server is current storing the history of the value.

opc:ComplexType.Name: MethodAttributes
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The attributes for a method node.

opc:Field.Name: Executable
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the method can be called.

opc:Field.Name: UserExecutable
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the method can be called by the current user.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ObjectTypeAttributes
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The attributes for an object type node.

opc:Field.Name: IsAbstract
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the type is abstract and only subtypes of it appear in the address space.

opc:ComplexType.Name: VariableTypeAttributes
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The attributes for a variable type node.

opc:Field.Name: Value
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The default value when creating new instances.

opc:Field.Name: DataType
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The data type of the value.

opc:Field.Name: ValueRank
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Whether the value is an array type and the rank of the array if it is.

opc:Field.Name: ArrayDimensions
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The number of dimensions if the value is an array type and one or more dimensions have a fixed length.

opc:Field.Name: IsAbstract
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the type is abstract and only subtypes of it appear in the address space.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ReferenceTypeAttributes
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The attributes for a reference type node.

opc:Field.Name: IsAbstract
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the type is abstract and only subtypes of it appear in the address space.

opc:Field.Name: Symmetric
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the reference type has the same semantics in both directions.

opc:Field.Name: InverseName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The display name for the reference when following it from target to source.

opc:ComplexType.Name: DataTypeAttributes
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The attributes for a data type node.

opc:Field.Name: IsAbstract
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the type is abstract and only subtypes of it appear in the address space.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ViewAttributes
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The attributes for a view node.

opc:Field.Name: ContainsNoLoops
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the view contains a tree of non-looping hierarchical references.

opc:Field.Name: EventNotifier
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask indicating whether events are produced by the view.

opc:ComplexType.Name: AddNodesItem
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A request to add a node to the server address space.

opc:Field.Name: ParentNodeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The node id for the parent node.

opc:Field.Name: ReferenceTypeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type of reference from the parent to the new node.

opc:Field.Name: RequestedNewNodeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The node id requested by the client. If null the server must provide one.

opc:Field.Name: BrowseName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The browse name for the new node.

opc:Field.Name: NodeClass
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The class of the new node.

opc:Field.Name: NodeAttributes
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The default attributes for the new node.

opc:Field.Name: TypeDefinition
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type definition for the new node.

opc:ComplexType.Name: AddNodesResult
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A result of an add node operation.

opc:Field.Name: StatusCode
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A code indicating any error during the operation.

opc:Field.Name: AddedNodeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The id of the new node.

opc:ServiceType.Name: AddNodes
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Adds one or more nodes to the server address space.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: NodesToAdd
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The list of nodes to add.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: Results
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The results for the add node operations.

opc:Parameter.Name: DiagnosticInfos
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The diagnostics associated with the results returned.

opc:ComplexType.Name: AddReferencesItem
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A request to add a reference to the server address space.

opc:Field.Name: SourceNodeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The source of the reference.

opc:Field.Name: ReferenceTypeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type of reference.

opc:Field.Name: IsForward
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the reference is a forward reference.

opc:Field.Name: TargetServerUri
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The URI of the server containing the target (if in another server).

opc:Field.Name: TargetNodeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The target of the reference.

opc:Field.Name: TargetNodeClass
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The node class of the target (if known).

opc:ServiceType.Name: AddReferences
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Adds one or more references to the server address space.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ReferencesToAdd
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The list of references to add.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: Results
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The results for the add reference operations.

opc:Parameter.Name: DiagnosticInfos
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The diagnostics associated with the results returned.

opc:ComplexType.Name: DeleteNodesItem
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A request to delete a node to the server address space.

opc:Field.Name: NodeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The id of the node to delete.

opc:Field.Name: DeleteTargetReferences
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE all references to the are deleted as well.

opc:ServiceType.Name: DeleteNodes
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Delete one or more nodes from the server address space.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: NodesToDelete
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The list of nodes to delete.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: Results
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The results for the delete nodes operations.

opc:Parameter.Name: DiagnosticInfos
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The diagnostics associated with the results returned.

opc:ComplexType.Name: DeleteReferencesItem
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A request to delete a node from the server address space.

opc:Field.Name: SourceNodeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The source of the reference to delete.

opc:Field.Name: ReferenceTypeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type of reference to delete.

opc:Field.Name: IsForward
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the a forward reference is deleted.

opc:Field.Name: TargetNodeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The target of the reference to delete.

opc:Field.Name: DeleteBidirectional
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the reference is deleted in both directions.

opc:ServiceType.Name: DeleteReferences
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Delete one or more references from the server address space.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ReferencesToDelete
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The list of references to delete.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: Results
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The results for the delete reference operations.

opc:Parameter.Name: DiagnosticInfos
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The diagnostics associated with the results returned.

opc:EnumeratedType.Name: AttributeWriteMask
opc:EnumeratedType.opc:Documentation: Define bits used to indicate which attributes are writeable.

opc:Value.Name: None
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: No attributes are writeable.

opc:Value.Name: AccessLevel
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The access level attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: ArrayDimensions
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The array dimensions attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: BrowseName
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The browse name attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: ContainsNoLoops
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The contains no loops attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: DataType
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The data type attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: Description
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The description attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: DisplayName
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The display name attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: EventNotifier
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The event notifier attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: Executable
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The executable attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: Historizing
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The historizing attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: InverseName
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The inverse name attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: IsAbstract
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The is abstract attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: MinimumSamplingInterval
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The minimum sampling interval attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: NodeClass
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node class attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: NodeId
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The node id attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: Symmetric
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The symmetric attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: UserAccessLevel
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The user access level attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: UserExecutable
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The user executable attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: UserWriteMask
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The user write mask attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: ValueRank
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The value rank attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: WriteMask
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The write mask attribute is writeable.

opc:Value.Name: ValueForVariableType
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: The value attribute is writeable.

opc:EnumeratedType.Name: BrowseDirection
opc:EnumeratedType.opc:Documentation: The directions of the references to return.

opc:Value.Name: Forward
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return forward references.

opc:Value.Name: Inverse
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return inverse references.

opc:Value.Name: Both
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return forward and inverse references.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ViewDescription
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The view to browse.

opc:Field.Name: ViewId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The node id of the view.

opc:Field.Name: Timestamp
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Browses the view at or before this time.

opc:Field.Name: ViewVersion
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Browses a specific version of the view .

opc:ComplexType.Name: BrowseDescription
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A request to browse the the references from a node.

opc:Field.Name: NodeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The id of the node to browse.

opc:Field.Name: BrowseDirection
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The direction of the references to return.

opc:Field.Name: ReferenceTypeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type of references to return.

opc:Field.Name: IncludeSubtypes
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: Includes subtypes of the reference type.

opc:Field.Name: NodeClassMask
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask indicating which node classes to return. 0 means return all nodes.

opc:Field.Name: ResultMask
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A mask indicating which fields should be returned in the results.

opc:EnumeratedType.Name: BrowseResultMask
opc:EnumeratedType.opc:Documentation: A bit mask which specifies what should be returned in a browse response.

opc:Value.Name: None
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return only the node id.

opc:Value.Name: ReferenceTypeId
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return the reference type id.

opc:Value.Name: IsForward
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return the flag indicating whether the reference is a forward reference.

opc:Value.Name: NodeClass
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return the node class.

opc:Value.Name: BrowseName
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return the browse name.

opc:Value.Name: DisplayName
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return the display name.

opc:Value.Name: TypeDefinition
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return the type definition.

opc:Value.Name: All
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return all fields.

opc:Value.Name: ReferenceTypeInfo
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return the reference type information.

opc:Value.Name: TargetInfo
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Return the information about the target node.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ReferenceDescription
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The description of a reference.

opc:Field.Name: ReferenceTypeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type of references.

opc:Field.Name: IsForward
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: TRUE if the reference is a forward reference.

opc:Field.Name: NodeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The id of the target node.

opc:Field.Name: BrowseName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The browse name of the target node.

opc:Field.Name: DisplayName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The display name of the target node.

opc:Field.Name: NodeClass
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The node class of the target node.

opc:Field.Name: TypeDefinition
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type definition of the target node.

opc:TypeDeclaration.Name: ContinuationPoint
opc:TypeDeclaration.opc:Documentation: An identifier for a suspended query or browse operation.

opc:ComplexType.Name: BrowseResult
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The result of a browse operation.

opc:Field.Name: StatusCode
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A code indicating any error during the operation.

opc:Field.Name: ContinuationPoint
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A value that indicates the operation is incomplete and can be continued by calling BrowseNext.

opc:Field.Name: References
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A list of references that meet the criteria specified in the request.

opc:ServiceType.Name: Browse
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Browse the references for one or more nodes from the server address space.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: View
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The view to browse.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestedMaxReferencesPerNode
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The maximum number of references to return in the response.

opc:Parameter.Name: NodesToBrowse
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The list of nodes to browse.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: Results
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The results for the browse operations.

opc:Parameter.Name: DiagnosticInfos
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The diagnostics associated with the results.

opc:ServiceType.Name: BrowseNext
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Continues one or more browse operations.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: ReleaseContinuationPoints
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the continuation points are released and no results are returned.

opc:Parameter.Name: ContinuationPoints
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The contination points returned from a previous call to Browse and BrowseNext.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: Results
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The results for the browse operations.

opc:Parameter.Name: DiagnosticInfos
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The diagnostics associated with the results.

opc:ComplexType.Name: RelativePathElement
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: An element in a relative path.

opc:Field.Name: ReferenceTypeId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The type of reference to follow.

opc:Field.Name: IsInverse
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE the reverse reference is followed.

opc:Field.Name: IncludeSubtypes
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: If TRUE then subtypes of the reference type are followed.

opc:Field.Name: TargetName
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The browse name of the target.

opc:ComplexType.Name: RelativePath
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A relative path constructed from reference types and browse names.

opc:Field.Name: Elements
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A list of elements in the path.

opc:ComplexType.Name: BrowsePath
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A request to translate a path into a node id.

opc:Field.Name: StartingNode
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The starting point for the search.

opc:Field.Name: RelativePath
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The path to follow.

opc:ComplexType.Name: BrowsePathTarget
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The target of the translated path.

opc:Field.Name: TargetId
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The id of the target node.

opc:Field.Name: RemainingPathIndex
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: The index of the target in the relative path. UInt32.MaxValue if the entire path was processed.

opc:ComplexType.Name: BrowsePathResult
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: The result of a translate opearation.

opc:Field.Name: StatusCode
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A code indicating any error during the operation.

opc:Field.Name: Targets
opc:Field.opc:Documentation: A list of nodes found. The first element matches the type definition.

opc:ServiceType.Name: TranslateBrowsePathsToNodeIds
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Translates one or more paths in the server address space.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: BrowsePaths
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The list of paths to translate.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: Results
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The results for the translate operations.

opc:Parameter.Name: DiagnosticInfos
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The diagnostics associated with the results.

opc:ServiceType.Name: RegisterNodes
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Registers one or more nodes for repeated use within a session.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: NodesToRegister
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The list of nodes to register.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:Parameter.Name: RegisteredNodeIds
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The list of node ids that can be used for fast access to the nodes.

opc:ServiceType.Name: UnregisterNodes
opc:ServiceType.opc:Documentation: Unregisters one or more previously registered nodes.

opc:Parameter.Name: RequestHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all requests sent to a server.

opc:Parameter.Name: NodesToUnregister
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: The list of nodes to unregister.

opc:Parameter.Name: ResponseHeader
opc:Parameter.opc:Documentation: A standard header included in all responses returned by servers.

opc:TypeDeclaration.Name: NumericRange
opc:TypeDeclaration.opc:Documentation: Specifies a range of array indexes.

opc:TypeDeclaration.Name: Time
opc:TypeDeclaration.opc:Documentation: A time value specified as HH:MM:SS.SSS.

opc:EnumeratedType.Name: EnumeratedTestType
opc:EnumeratedType.opc:Documentation: A simple enumerated type used for testing.

opc:Value.Name: Red
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Operation has halted.

opc:Value.Name: Yellow
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Operation is proceeding with caution.

opc:Value.Name: Green
opc:Value.opc:Documentation: Operation is proceeding normally.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ScalarTestType
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A complex type containing all possible scalar types used for testing.

opc:ComplexType.Name: ArrayTestType
opc:ComplexType.opc:Documentation: A complex type containing all possible array types used for testing.
